itunes:summary:
Two serial killers — one a man killing homeless people, the other a homeless person killing women — were caught this week, St. Patrick’s Day falls on the first day of the NCAA Tournament and might be the biggest drinking day of 2022, and a UFC fighter stopped a gunman at a Houston restaurant.
